item.title: hello!
item.description: my name is Smaran. I am a third-year computer science student based in Atlanta, GA ğŸ. I have a variety of interests that are hopefully evident from the content of this website. you can look at my art with your eye(s) here you can look at my code with your computer(s) here this is my website. there are many like it, but this one is mine. i built it myself, with a little help from my friend hugo
